The user utilises their gunpowder mist to combust with every punch they strike at the opponent. They finish the opponent a large slam, causing a large explosion.

== Trivia ==
* One of Boro's initial punches destroys his arm, which he [[Self-Healing Technique|regrows]] before continuing.
